mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME, PASSWORD, INCOMEDATE, DELTAG, BEFORM, SYS_USER_INFO_USER_ID
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SYS_ACCOUNT AS sac WHERE sac.ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ACCOUNT (ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_NAME, PASSWORD, INCOMEDATE, DELTAG, BEFORM, SYS_USER_INFO_USER_ID) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deltag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{beform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserInfoUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SYS_ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_ID,
ACCOUNT_NAME,
PASSWORD,
INCOMEDATE,
DELTAG,
BEFORM,
SYS_USER_INFO_USER_ID,

mapper.update:
update SYS_ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOMEDATE = #{incomedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELTAG = #{deltag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
BEFORM = #{beform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_USER_INFO_USER_ID = #{sysUserInfoUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_ACCOUNT set ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOMEDATE = #{incomedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELTAG = #{deltag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BEFORM = #{beform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_USER_INFO_USER_ID = #{sysUserInfoUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
